work-experience.content: I Mentor students in robotics and physics projects, ensuring eligibility for honors graduation, academic candidacy, and elite IDF unit selection. I promote independent work and interdisciplinary critical thinking. I started this role as a volunteer work and was offered a job as a teacher and advisor due to my leadership and mentoring skills.

I Coded CAD Python software for DFT teams, covering all stages of algorithm development from research and implementation to testing, debugging, and deployment, using CI/CD & Agile methodologies. Conducted design reviews, produced status reports & documentation, and provided technical support. Used Unix command-line tools such as RegEx, awk, SED, and SQL, coupled with Pandas library to process, manipulate, and analyze data.

I Programmed object-oriented C++ and Python automated tests for a computer vision chip. Integrated software for learning algorithms embedded in the chip, including CNN, SLAM, object detection, and face recognition. Employed diverse testing frameworks (unit, E2E, performance, and regression testing) with Visual Studio IDE. Managed projects using Jira, automated processes with Jenkins and Docker, and chip data retrieval via UART technology. Applied OOP, design patterns principles, and OpenCV library for image processing and testing.

I Provided tutoring for students in various subjects, including Linear Algebra, C Programming, Physics, and Introduction to Signal Processing. Assisted students in understanding complex concepts, preparing for exams, and improving their academic performance. Developed personalized study plans and resources to meet individual learning needs.

Delivered high-quality service at a premier event venue, catering to a wide range of private and corporate events. Managed multiple tables simultaneously during large-scale events, ensuring timely and accurate service. Coordinated closely with the kitchen and event staff to meet the specific needs of each event, contributing to the seamless execution of weddings, conferences, and other high-profile gatherings. Consistently received positive feedback from clients for professionalism, attention to detail, and ability to handle high-pressure situations with poise.

Managed the timely and efficient delivery of daily newspapers to a broad customer base, ensuring consistent customer satisfaction and high delivery accuracy. Developed and optimized delivery routes to minimize time and increase coverage, leading to a 15% improvement in delivery efficiency. Built strong relationships with customers, addressing any delivery concerns promptly and professionally. Played a key role in maintaining the reputation of the newspaper through reliable and consistent service.

education.content: A 6-month intensive AI training, focused on computer vision and NLP, covering mathematics & statistics foundations, optimization techniques, learning architectures, and implementation of building blocks. I built AI projects prioritizing use-case-oriented thinking while collaborating with peers. Topics: Un/Supervised Learning, Big Data, EDA, Transformer Models, Deep Learning concepts, etc. Tools: Jupyter, NumPy, SciPy, Seaborn, Pandas, Scikit-learn, TensorFlow, Pytorch, Keras, CUDA, etc.

Created dynamic, responsive websites, user interfaces, and robust, scalable applications by applying full-stack tools, frameworks, and industry best practices. Frontend Tools: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, React, jQuery, npm, and Sass. Backend Tools: NodeJS, ExpressJS, SQL, NoSQL, MongoDB, Postman, and RESTful API. Projects: Minecraft Game, To Do List, Dice Game.

GPA: 78. Majored in VLSI, computers, and signal processing. Final Project: Arduino-Based IoT Water Nitrate Pollution Monitoring System for Agriculture. Notable Project: Blind source separation MATLAB project, de-noising time-series audio signals.

Participated in developing an electric racing car, designing & integrating BMS according to specifications under challenging power consumption, heat dissipation, space, cost, and performance constraints.
Full Service as a squad commander, where I led and trained over 300 new recruits, successfully enforcing a rigorous schedule and maintaining high standards of discipline and performance.
Graduated summa cum laude, majoring in Biology & Health Systems, with recognition for excellence in social leadership.
